document_data.mainbody:
Chamon was one of ten guards stationed at the enclave run by the young Red Wizard Hinnar.
Chamon was tough, strong, and dexterous.
Like the other guards at the enclave, Chamon was trained in the expert use of the bastard sword and possessed a finely crafted example. Chamon also carried a longspear and a composite longbow and was trained in ranged combat at short range.
Chamon worked in alternating shifts guarding the six watch platforms, observing the sales booth, or patroling the compound grounds.
When adventures came to the enclave, seeking information about the kidnapping of Talf and Elonn, Chamon was completely ignorant of the fact that the two young men had been taken by the wizard Kizzaf.
